name: Hybrid Diagnostics
shortDescription: Advanced hybrid system scans and ECU diagnostics.
fullDescription: Our hybrid diagnostics service uses manufacturer-grade diagnostic tools to scan hybrid control modules, ECUs, inverters, battery management systems, and regenerative braking components. We identify fault codes, performance inconsistencies, sensor failures, and communication errors between hybrid subsystems.

name: Battery Replacement & Testing
shortDescription: Replace old hybrid batteries and test performance.
fullDescription: We safely replace high-voltage hybrid batteries and conduct full performance testing to ensure maximum efficiency and reliability.

name: Engine Maintenance & Repairs
fullDescription: We handle both traditional and hybrid engine components, including spark plugs, filters, pistons, cooling systems, and exhaust repairs.

name: Inverter & Power Unit Servicing
fullDescription: We service inverters, power control units, and hybrid energy management systems to ensure optimal performance.

name: Suspension & Braking Services
fullDescription: We provide maintenance and replacement for suspension systems, brake pads, regenerative braking checks, and safety inspections.

name: Cooling Systems Service
fullDescription: We service cooling fans, pumps, and thermal systems to prevent overheating and maintain peak performance.

name: Gearbox & Transmission Maintenance
fullDescription: We perform full gearbox diagnostics, servicing, and replacements to keep your hybrid transmission smooth and efficient.

name: Auxiliary & Safety Systems
fullDescription: We ensure all auxiliary and safety components, including HV cables and connectors, are safe and functioning properly.
